name: fexd
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0

stmt.origin: syl2anc(w0, wcel(c0, universe), wf(c0, c1, c2), wcel(c1, c3))
stmt.pretty: syl2anc(w0, c0 ∈ 𝕌, (c0 : c1 → c2), c1 ∈ c3)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, universe))
-| wi(w0, wf(c0, c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c3))
-| wi(wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wcel(c1, c3)), wcel(c0, universe))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, universe))
-| wi(w0, wf(c0, c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c3))
-| wi(wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wcel(c1, c3)), wcel(c0, universe))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wcel(c1, c3)), wcel(c0, universe))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, universe))
-| wi(w0, wf(c0, c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c3))

comment: If the domain of a mapping is a set, the function is a set. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
